notfin.py.data:
# coding: utf-8
nota1 = float(raw_input())
nota2 = float(raw_input())
nota3 = float(raw_input())
peso1 = float(raw_input())
peso2 = float(raw_input())
peso3 = (100 - peso1 - peso2)
print "Média Final: %.1f" % ((nota1 * peso1 + nota2 * peso2 + nota3 * peso3)/100)
